verses.roman:
chānā, pānā, paiḍa, āmra, nārikela, kāṅṭhāla
nānā-vidha kadalaka, āra bīja-tāla

synonyms: chānā—curd; pānā—fruit juice; paiḍa—coconut; āmra—mango; nārikela—dried coconut; kāṅṭhāla—jackfruit; nānā-vidha—various kinds of; kadalaka—bananas; āra—and; bīja-tāla—palm fruit seeds.
translation: There was curd, fruit juice, coconut, mango, dried coconut, jackfruit, various kinds of bananas and palm fruit seeds.

purport.content: This is the first list of prasāda offered to Lord Jagannātha.
